question: Which state CM launches the establishment of Micro, Small, Medium Entrepreneurs (MSME) Development Corporation recently?
explanation: Andhra Pradesh Chief Minister CM Chandrababu launches the establishment of Micro, Small, Medium Entrepreneurs (MSME) Development Corporation at Vijayawada with a fund of Rs.100 crore on the occasion of International MSME Day. MSME parks would be developed in 100 to 150 acres of land in various districts.
